LanguageData.EH.EnterOnlyTT: Pawns entering the map will try to do it near this spot
LanguageData.EH.ExitOnlyTT: Pawns exiting the map will try to do it near this spot
LanguageData.EH.EnterAndExitTT: Pawns entering or exiting the map will try to do it near this spot
LanguageData.EH.Title: Select what types of visitors should try to use enter-spots
LanguageData.EH.Traders.Tooltip: All traders using the vanilla trading-logic
LanguageData.EH.Visitors.Tooltip: Visitor groups wanting to spend some time at the colony
LanguageData.EH.Travelers.Tooltip: Traveler groups passing through your area
LanguageData.EH.Colonists.Tooltip: Colonists in a caravan returning to the map
LanguageData.EH.EnemyRaids.Tooltip: Enemy raids. NOTE: Depending on the use this can be abused, play nice!
LanguageData.EH.MustPlaceNearEdge: Must be placed near the map edge
